name: Your Turn To Die : Death Warrant By Chance
name_original: Your Turn To Die : Death Warrant By Chance
description: Your Turn to Die: -Death Warrant by Chance- is a nonprofit Your Turn to Die fangame project inspired by the game Your Turn to Die: -Death Game by Majority-. Any copyright material that has been used is purely transformative and belongs to Nankidai. All depictions of characters are not meant to replicate the original. Backgrounds, custom music tracks and some characters have been inspired by Your Turn to Die as well. It is purely meant to be a different outlook on the story of Your Turn to Die and is not meant to tie into it in any way. The work falls under fair use and Nankidai has been personally informed and approved of the project.
